official_title: To authorize the Secretary of Transportation to sell up to 20 victory ships in the National Defense Reserve Fleet.

summary.text: Victory Ship Revitalization Act of 1992 - Authorizes the Secretary of Transportation to sell up to 20 victory ships in the National Defense Reserve Fleet for use in the domestic trade. Sets forth specified limitations on the sale of such vessels, including restriction of such sales to U.S. citizens. Requires the deposit of proceeds from such sales in the Vessel Operations Revolving Fund.

titles.title: To authorize the Secretary of Transportation to sell up to 20 victory ships in the National Defense Reserve Fleet.
